open_positions.open_positions_description: currently open positions, these don't depend on the time range

accounts.name: Name
accounts.account_error_message: An error occurred while saving the account
accounts.account_sync_trades_descriptions: If the account ID associated with this account is not already registered, we will sync all your closed postions based on your filled positions based on your the last 30 days. This may take a while
accounts.create_api_key_info: Don't you know how to create an API key? Follow this <link>guide</link> to learn how to create an API key.

create_key_tutorial.log_into_bingx_description: Access your <link>Bingx Account</link> and verify that your account meets all requirements for API access.
create_key_tutorial.go_to_api_managment_description: Find the 'API Management' tab in your account settings.
create_key_tutorial.config_and_create_your_api_key: Configure and create your API key
create_key_tutorial.only_read_permission_needed: Only the read permission is needed
create_key_tutorial.add_ip_whitelisting: Add IP Whitelisting, you can use a page like <link>this</link> to get the ip based on the domain.
create_key_tutorial.complete_verification_steps_to_continue: Complete the verification steps to continue
create_key_tutorial.copy_api_and_secret_key_description: Save the API and Secret Key in a secure location. Make sure to save them in this phase, if you don't do it now, you will not be able to get your secret key again.
